con:configuration.scriptText:
def xmlRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString def xmlSlurper = new groovy.xml.XmlSlurper(); def parse = xmlSlurper.parseText(xmlRes)
def shipList = parse.shipList.ship log.info shipList assert shipList!=null
def shipCode = parse.shipList.ship.code log.info shipCode assert shipCode!=null
def shipName = parse.shipList.ship.name log.info shipName assert shipName!=null

def shipCode = parse.shipList.ship.code log.info shipCode assert shipCode!=null
def shipName = parse.shipList.ship.name log.info shipName assert shipName!=null
